name: Pink Gorilla presents LEVEL UP: Pixel Pub & Gaming Lounge
blurb: A specialized gaming lounge and night club designed with the gamer in mind. Video games, food & drink, cosplay, special events, & more!

rewards.reward: No Reward
* BANANA LEVEL *\r\nBuys a virtual banana for our gorilla. Keeps him happy.
* PEASANT LEVEL * Receive a set of 5 limited edition Pink Gorilla / Level Up pins.
* GRUNT LEVEL * Receive one Level Up pint glass.

* MINION LEVEL * \r\nYour name on the Wall of Magnificence, and membership to Founder\u2019s Club, which grants you exclusive member\u2019s-only invitations to special Level Up events throughout the years.\r\n(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* BLACKSMITH LEVEL * Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & Membership to Founder\u2019s Club. Attend the Level Up groundbreaking pizza party! We'll provide food, refreshments, music and games, you just show up and get a sneak peek at the venue before it opens to the public! (+ a Level Up pint glass of course!) The party will occur almost immediately after the Kickstarter funding goal is met, and before construction begins.
* MINION PLUS ONE *\r\nYour name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder\u2019s Club, PLUS the ability to bring a guest with you to all Founder\u2019s Club events.

* MINI BOSS LEVEL *
Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder’s Club.
Receive one Pink Gorilla Gamer Girls of 2013 Calendar, with a signature and personalized message from the cover girl.
(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* MECHA-MINION LEVEL * Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & Membership to Founder\u2019s Club. In addition to the benefits of the Minion Plus One, the Mecha-Minion will also receive one PG Lanyard! (+ a Level Up pint glass). Note: All levels Mecha-Minion and higher will receive the lanyard.

* WARRIOR LEVEL * \r\nYour name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder\u2019s Club.\r\nReceive one exclusive PG Warrior T-Shirt (limited print run of 200). This enhanced armor will double the benefits of a normal Pink Gorilla tee, so you'll receive the Warrior treatment when wearing it in to any Pink Gorilla store any day of the week.

* HEROES & HEROINES LEVEL *
Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder’s Club.
Receive one exclusive PG Hero T-Shirt (limited print run of 100). This enhanced armor is a step up even from the Warrior tee, so you'll receive the added Warrior treatment when wearing it in to any Pink Gorilla store any day of the week.
(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* BARBARIAN LEVEL * Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder\u2019s Club. Receive one specially designed PG Hoodie! Of course, wearing this hoodie will bring you all the thrifty benefits of a Barbarian in all PG stores. (+ a Level Up pint glass)

* SERF LEVEL *
Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder’s Club.
Internship at a Pink Gorilla store location of your choice for one day. Consider this your interview!
(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* HYDRA LEVEL * Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder\u2019s Club. Receive one high-quality canvas print of your favorite Pink Gorilla t-shirt design from any of our wide selection of signature PG tees, past or present. (+ a Level Up pint glass)

* DRAGON LEVEL * Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder\u2019s Club.\r\nReceive one high-quality canvas print of your favorite pin-up girl from our 2013 Gamer Girls Calendar. Signature and personalized message highly likely (though not guaranteed, signatures are subject to availability of girls). Dragons will also receive the regular calendar as well.\r\n(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* MUSE LEVEL *
Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder’s Club.
Receive one 8”x10” custom pixel-art portrait of yourself, rendered by a talented local pixel artist.
(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* PRINCE & PRINCESS LEVEL *
Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder’s Club.
You and a friend are guests of honor in a hang out session with Pink Gorilla royalty for a night of shenanigans!
(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* MAN-SERVANT LEVEL*\r\nYour name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder\u2019s Club.\r\nOne night of VIP service at Level Up, where the hunky Pink Gorilla MANager, Gabe, will cheerfully wait on only you and up to five friends (and if you ask nicely, he might even dance for you in his special outfit). At the end of the night, all members of your party will take home a Level Up pint glass as a souvenir. (Reward must be redeemed within one year of Level Up's opening)

* FAIR MAIDEN LEVEL *\r\nYour name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder\u2019s Club.\r\nOne night of VIP service at Level Up, where the lovely Pink Gorilla manager and calendar cover girl, Leslie, will cheerfully wait on only you and up to five friends. At the end of the night, all members of your party will take home a Level Up pint glass as a souvenir. (Reward must be redeemed within one year of Level Up's opening)

* LORDS & LADIES LEVEL *\r\nYour name on the Wall of magnificence & membership to Founder\u2019s Club.\r\nYour name on a custom Level Up glass, kept forever behind the bar for your exclusive use whenever you visit.

* KNIGHT LEVEL *
Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder’s Club.
Your name on a Level Up bar stool, and the right to claim your throne for yourself during all member’s-only events.
(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* STORM THE CASTLE LEVEL * Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & Membership to Founder\u2019s Club. You will receive one daytime slot between 10am to 4pm to reserve Level Up facilities for your own private event of up to 100 participants.

* ASSASSIN LEVEL *
Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder’s Club.
On any given night, the Assassin has the right to always skip to the front of the line, and always be on the guest list as many times as they choose for one full year.
(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* SCRIBE LEVEL *
Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder’s Club.
Create and name your own specialty drink for the Club Kujira cocktail menu that will be used exclusively at member’s-only events. Receive the menu printed as a canvas scroll to use at home and show off to friends.
(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* ILLUSIONIST LEVEL *
Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder’s Club.
Your name on one of Level Up’s flat-screen TV monitors, AND your personal message or advertisement in rotation on Level Up’s slideshow monitor.
(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* ROYAL AMBASSADOR LEVEL *
Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder’s Club.
Dine with Pink Gorilla at the next Child’s Play Charity Auction dinner.
(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* MASON LEVEL *
Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder’s Club.
Your name on a Level Up booth, and the right to reserve your booth for you and your friends at all member’s-only events, and the ability to reserve it up to 5 times during the year on any regular night. You will also have a small portrait of yourself rendered by a talented local artist, and hung above the booth, and a canvas copy of your portrait to take home!
(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* ALCHEMIST LEVEL *
Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder’s Club.
Create and name your own drink that will forever be listed on Level Up’s primary drink menu. Additionally, a portrait of you, rendered by a talented local artist, will be printed on canvas and hung above the bar. You will also receive your own copy of your portrait printed on canvas to hang in your castle.
(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* GAMER OF THRONES *
Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder’s Club.
A large portrait of you, rendered by a talented local artist, will be printed on canvas and hung in the Level Up lavatory across from the porcelain throne. The Gamer of Thrones also retains the right to always be first in line to the bathroom at any occasion. You will also receive your own copy of your portrait printed on canvas to hang in your castle.
(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* KNIGHTS TEMPLAR *
Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder’s Club.
Your name on the one and only VIP table, reserved specially for you during all member’s-only events. Additionally, reserve it up to 10 times for you and your friends on any regular night.
(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* BARD LEVEL * Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & Membership to Founder\u2019s Club. \r\nA very large portrait of you, rendered by a talented local artist, will be printed on canvas and hung in the Level Up Music Game Room. You will additionally have the right to reserve this room for you and your friends up to 10 times on any night of the year. You will also receive your own copy of your portrait printed on canvas to hang in your castle.\r\n(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* OVERLORD *
Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder’s Club.
Your name and portrait, rendered by a talented local artist, will adorn the Level Up VIP loft. Your special VIP lair will be available to you during all member’s-only events, and additionally reserve it up to 6 times for you and your friends on any regular night, without cover or having to wait in line. You will also receive your own copy of your portrait printed on canvas to hang in your castle.
(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* COSPLAY KING *
Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder’s Club.
On one available date, rent out the entire fully-staffed Level Up facility for your very own private event. Choose a cosplay theme from your favorite video game and our whole staff will dress accordingly for the party! In addition, Level Up will permanently keep a special crown onsite, reserved only for you to wear whenever you grace us with your presence. You will never have to wait in any line for anything while wearing your crown.
(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* COSPLAY QUEEN *
Your name on the Wall of Magnificence & membership to Founder’s Club.
On one available date, rent out the entire fully-staffed Level Up facility for your very own private event. Choose a cosplay theme from your favorite video game and our whole staff will dress accordingly for the party! In addition, Level Up will permanently keep a special crown onsite, reserved only for you to wear whenever you grace us with your presence. You will never have to wait in any line for anything while wearing your crown.
(+ a Level Up pint glass)

* PATRON SAINT OF LEVEL UP *\r\nYour name on the Wall of Magnificence & Membership to Founder\u2019s Club. \r\nYou will forever be known as The Patron Saint of Level Up, the most prestigious title in all the land! In your honor, a plaque with your name, and a seriously HUGE portrait of you will be painted on canvas by a talented local artist, framed, and permanently hung in the entryway to Level Up for all to admire and pay tribute to. The Patron Saint will also have the power to reserve the entire fully-staffed Level Up facility two times for private events, receive a full-size canvas copy of their portrait, plus many more benefits during member\u2019s-only events that are far too numerous to list! (+ a Level Up pint glass)
